title: What is the Barcelona tennis schedule?
description: Play continues Thursday at the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell, the ATP 500 event in Spain. Among the players in action will be top seed Carlos Alcaraz, fourth seed Andrey Rublev and fifth seed Alex de Minaur. View Thursday's full order of play below (how to watch).    ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 17 APRIL 2025 Pista Rafa Nadal - start 11:00 AM Jaume Munar (ESP) vs. Karen Khachanov Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) vs. [4] Andrey Rublev Not Before 4:00 PM [1] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs. [Q] Laslo Djere (SER) [LL] Jacob Fearnley (GBR) vs. [5] Alex de Minaur (AUS) Pista Andres Gimeno - start 11:00 AM N. De Ribot (ESP) vs. [1] A. Garcia (ESP) Not before 2:00 PM Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) vs. [2] Nikola Mektic (CRO) / Michael Venus (NZL) [Q] Inigo Cervantes (ESP) / Oriol Roca Batalla (ESP) vs. [WC] Pedro Martinez (ESP) / Jaume Munar (ESP) Pista 2 - start 11:00 AM C. Ballester (ESP) vs. [2] S. Garcia (ESP) [1] P. Cortes (ESP) vs. V. Meza (ESP) [4] NM. Nurzhan (KAZ) vs. A. Roges (ESP) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Barcelona

View the full Thursday order of play for Barcelona

April 16, 2025

Eric Alonso/Getty Images

The Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell is played at the Real Club de Tenis Barcelona-1899. By ATP Staff

Play continues Thursday at the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell, the ATP 500 event in Spain. Among the players in action will be top seed Carlos Alcaraz, fourth seed Andrey Rublev and fifth seed Alex de Minaur.

View Thursday's full order of play below (how to watch). 

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 17 APRIL 2025
Pista Rafa Nadal - start 11:00 AM
Jaume Munar (ESP) vs. Karen Khachanov
Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) vs. [4] Andrey Rublev

Not Before 4:00 PM
[1] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs. [Q] Laslo Djere (SER)
[LL] Jacob Fearnley (GBR) vs. [5] Alex de Minaur (AUS)

Pista Andres Gimeno - start 11:00 AM
N. De Ribot (ESP) vs. [1] A. Garcia (ESP)

Not before 2:00 PM
 Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) vs. [2] Nikola Mektic (CRO) / Michael Venus (NZL)
[Q] Inigo Cervantes (ESP) / Oriol Roca Batalla (ESP) vs. [WC] Pedro Martinez (ESP) / Jaume Munar (ESP)

Pista 2 - start 11:00 AM
C. Ballester (ESP) vs. [2] S. Garcia (ESP)
[1] P. Cortes (ESP) vs. V. Meza (ESP)
[4] NM. Nurzhan (KAZ) vs. A. Roges (ESP)
